main_definition: To produce a line or mark by making it move across a surface, or to attract someone's attention.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To create a picture using lines and marks
meanings_and_examples.example: She will draw a beautiful landscape with vibrant colors.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To win or tie in a game of chance by matching the same numbered pieces as another player
meanings_and_examples.example: They drew five cards each, resulting in an evenly matched game.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To pull something towards oneself with force
meanings_and_examples.example: The magnet will draw all iron objects toward itself.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To engage or attract someone's attention
meanings_and_examples.example: His captivating story drew the audience into a spellbinding silence.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To remove liquid from an object by suction
meanings_and_examples.example: She used her straw to draw juice out of the milkshake bottle.
